Parse a collection of R Markdown or Quarto document

Source: R/parse_collection.R
parse_collection.Rd

Recursively searches a directory for R Markdown or Quarto documents and parses them into a collection of rmd_ast objects

Usage

parse_qmd_collection(
  dir = "./",
  pattern = "*.qmd",
  all = FALSE,
  recurse = TRUE,
  regex = FALSE
)

parse_rmd_collection(
  dir = "./",
  pattern = "*.Rmd",
  all = FALSE,
  recurse = TRUE,
  regex = FALSE
)

Arguments

dir

Directory to search

pattern

Pattern to match files, defaults to glob syntax

all

Search includes hidden files

recurse

Search recusively within dir

regex

Treat pattern as a regular expression syntax for pattern

Value

Returns a tibble object with columns for document name, path, and ast.

Examples

parse_rmd_collection(system.file("examples/", package="parsermd"))
